ProductInfo.Features:
Weatherproof housing ensures reliable operation for outdoor applications
Perfect for surveillance systems where you don't want noticeable cameras
CCD Image sensor. 420 TVL horizontal resolution. NTSC Standard
Build in f3.7mm Cone Pinhole Lens
Package included: 1 x CCD camera, 1 x adjustable swivel mount, 1 x 12V DC 500mA power supply and 1 x video power extension cable
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor Pinhole Hidden Color CCD Bullet Surveillance Security Camera 3.7mm Lens Weatherproof for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System with Power Supply and Extension Cable CBX
